name: Neon Kite
description:
Neon kite is a VR arcade simulation game for Oculus Quest 1/2 where you kitesurf in a procedurally generated, Synthwave inspired world while trying to get the highest score possible.

Check out my Patreon if you enjoy this game and want to support the project!

https://www.patreon.com/VirtualProjection

Enjoy!

Music from:

Synthetic / Through The Waves / Neonscapes / Goodbye Ocean by | e s c p

https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
